title: Testing For Covid-19
content:
You may choose a NAAT, including PCR, or antigen test. If you use an antigen test and your result is negative, repeat testing following
FDA recommendations
.
I tested positive for COVID-19 in the last 90 days.
My first positive test result was within 30 days or less:
I have symptoms:
Use an antigen test. Repeat negative tests following
FDA recommendations
.
I do not have symptoms:
Testing is not recommended to detect a new infection.
My first positive test result was within 31-90 days:
